message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. For this exceptional item, I am proposing an initial price of $200. I'm confident it will provide significant value to you, surpassing its cost.

Alice, thank you for the offer, but $200 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. If that works for you, let's make a deal. Otherwise, I'll have to consider other options.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. Let me propose a price of $150 for the product. This is still above the market average, but I believe it offers good value considering the quality and benefits of the item. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Alice, $150 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in your product, but my maximum budget is $100. If you're willing to come down to that price, we can finalize the deal. Otherwise, I'll have to go with another seller.
